name: Convergent Paths
description:
Sarah the apprentice witch has gotten dragged into a fight against aliens. Can she come out on top? or will she be forever trapped in another world. controls:

- WASD to move

- Left click to fire your flamethrower

- Right click to dash (dashing gives you I frames)

Thank you!

Making this for the #MyFirstGameJam winter 2023 was super fun! I started kinda at the end of the jam and had to go through four prototypes before I found something I liked. I am rather surprised I made a game I'm so pleased with. I can't wait to make more. And to play your games! thanks for playing!

Assets I used

- Witches Pack by 9e0 https://9e0.itch.io/witches-pack

This asset pack was so much fun to use! I really loved seeing my game come to life with these witches!

- Space Music Pack by Goose Ninja https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack

Honestly this one came in clutch, I was looking at some other peoples games and realized I didn't have any music on the last day! when I found his music I was super pleased and excited to use it.

- Sound effects by Shapeforms https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx

These are awesome sound effects, I'm glad to be able to have sound in my game for the first time ever!
